}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz *Flash/RAM: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 32MB RAM *8x Gigabit Ethernet ports, 2x GbE SFP slots *20Gbps switching capacity
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:TP-LINK TL-SG3210 V2.2 Internal.jpeg|Internal File:TP-LINK TL-SG3210 V2.2 Top.jpeg|Main Board Top </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
